jei.tinkersurvival.description.rock: Rocks are found lying on the ground. These can be used with the knife in a crafting table to get flint shards.
jei.tinkersurvival.description.plant_fib: Plant fibers are dropped when breaking grass with a knife. They are used to make plant string for tools and plant paste for bandage ointment.
jei.tinkersurvival.description.stick: Sticks are dropped from leaves. Using any knife doubles the chance of getting a stick.
jei.tinkersurvival.description.flint_sha: Flint shards can be obtained from striking flint on any rocky surface. Attack any stone like block with flint, and it might split into two flint shards.
tooltip.uselessTool2: Can only be used for crafting.
tooltip.uselessWeapon1: This weapon hits like a wet noodle!
tooltip.uselessArmor1: Axiom sizing: XXXL. Probably won't fit.
modifier.insulated_armor.description: Adds a +1 heating modifier to an armor piece. Not stackable.
modifier.chilling_armor.description: Adds a -1 cooling modifier to an armor piece. Not stackable.
Your first knife. It does not look very sharp, but maybe you can use it to cut some grass.
advancements.tinkersurvival.crude_hatche: The crude hatchet allows you to harvest wood and other basic materials.
advancements.tinkersurvival.crude_saw.de: Splits wood logs into planks and planks into sticks if enabled in the TinkerSurvival config. Otherwise does nothing.
Obtain a flint by digging through gravel with your bare hands. Then smash the flint against a rocky surface (R-Click e.g. Stone) to get two flint shards. Be careful they have sharp edges!
advancements.tinkersurvival.plant_string: If used to craft pants, they make a feeping sound when you ... FEEEP
advancements.tinkersurvival.rock.title: I found a rock...
advancements.tinkersurvival.rock.descrip: They either lie around or can be obtained by digging through some dirt with your hands. It does not seem to do anything... maybe if I had four?
advancements.tinkersurvival.root.descrip: Tinker Survival Recipes. Hint: start by digging through some gravel!
advancements.tinkersurvival.stick.title: A "Sticky" situation.
advancements.tinkersurvival.stick.descri: You may find some sticks if you go and punch some leaves. Sticks and stones may break my bones, but words will ... also hurt me, because everyone cares about words thrown in their face.
advancements.tinkersurvival.toolforge.de: Let's build some even fancier tools.
MOD_TOOL_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of mods that tools will always work for. All other mod tools will become wet noodles.
TOOLS_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of individual tools that will always work. Format tooltype-modid:item
MOD_ARMOR_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of mods that armor will always work and be craftable for. All other mod armor will not be equipable or craftable.
ARMOR_WHITELIST.tooltip: List of individual armor items that will always work. Format modid:item
ARMOR_TEMP_MODIFIERS.tooltip: List of all armor with temperature modifiers. Format modid:item=modifier
INSULATED_MODIFIER.tooltip: Construct's Armory wool insulation modifier amount.
CHILLING_MODIFIER.tooltip: Construct's Armory jelled slime cooling modifier amount.
ENABLE_ROCKGEN.tooltip: Enables the generation of rock piles on the surface. Default true
ROCKGEN_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a rocks to generate on surface. Default 1.0D (= 100%)
ENABLE_ROCK_FROM_DIRT.tooltip: Enables rock drop from harvesting dirt. (default: false)
ROCK_FROM_DIRT_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a rocks to drop from harvesting dirt with bare hands. Default 0.4 (= 40%)
FLINT_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for a successful flint knapping. Default 60% - 0.6D
GRASS_FIBER_CHANCE.tooltip: Chance for tall grass to drop plant fibers. Default 60% - 0.6D. Knives are 40% more effective.
HEAL_RATE.tooltip: Heal rate for bandages. Crude bandages are 50% less effective.
SLOW_DOWN_MULTIPLIER.tooltip: Option to adjust slow down on wrong tool usage. Default 1.0)
GRIEFING_WHITELIST.tooltip: Ok, I love endermen, make them pick up this stuff. If NO_GRIEFING=true
NO_SLEEPING.tooltip: I cry myself to sleep at night...
SLOW_DOWN_DIRT_PUNCHING.tooltip: Includes dirt in the slowdown of mining speed with bare hands. Default true
ENABLE_SAW.tooltip: Enables the saw item to craft planks. Default true
FORCE_SAW_FOR_PLANKS.tooltip: Removes plank and stick recipes from the game, only craftable with saw. Default true
ENABLE_FAIL_SOUND.tooltip: Enables the fail sound if using the wrong tool.
